mapper.insert: insert into member(MEM_ID,MEM_PW,MEM_ADDRESS, MEM_NAME, MEM_PHONE, MEM_BIRTH, MEM_GENDER, MEM_ACCOUNT, MEM_EMAIL, MEM_EMAIL_CK, POST_NUMBER, DETAIL_ADD) values(#{memId},#{memPw},#{memAddress},#{memName},#{memPhone}, #{memBirth},#{memGender},#{memAccount},#{memEmail},#{memEmailCk}, #{postNumber},#{detailAdd})
